text: The Hershey bar is a flagship chocolate bar. It is manufactured by The Hershey Company. It refers to it as "The Great American Chocolate Bar". It was first sold in 1900. They had their origin in Milton Hershey's first successful confectionery business, Lancaster Caramel Company, which was founded in 1886. Category:Chocolate bars Category:The Hershey Company
title: Hershey bar
